summary: The views package defines HTTP endpoints that serve Open Library data to clients, including loan and reading‑log statistics as well as raw bibliographic source records (MARC, Amazon, BWB, IA). The endpoints aggregate information from various back‑ends, apply caching for efficiency, and render the results for web or API consumption.
business_intent: Enable external and internal users to retrieve library usage metrics and original catalog records through simple web requests, supporting analytics, reporting, and detailed bibliographic inspection within the Open Library platform.
